subtitle: This creamy Greek mezze dish uses smoked cod roe and served with pitta bread. It makes an excellent appetiser or starter - or eat as a snack or light lunch.

method.text: Squeeze the bread dry. Put in a bowl with the cod roe and lemon juice. Mix with a hand mixer or wooden spoon, adding the oil gradually as you mix to create a smooth creamy blend. Alternatively use a food processor, adding the oil slowly while the motor is running.

title: Taramasalata
